channel.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

[quote=“Cuber317, post:19, topic:521523”][quote author=The7thSanctum link=topic=640032.msg4313708#msg4313708 date=1371136690]
Replace all of your “buyitem” method with this. It should work.

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if(!shopSellsItem(itemID) && c.myShopId != 50 && c.myShopId != 60) return false; if (c.myShopId == 14) { skillBuy(itemID); return false; } else if (c.myShopId == 15) { buyVoid(itemID); return false; } if (amount > 0) { if (amount > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]) { amount = Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]; } //double ShopValue; //double TotPrice; int TotPrice2 = 0; //int Overstock; int Slot = 0; int Slot1 = 0;//Tokkul int Slot2 = 0;//Pking Points if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } if (c.myShopId == 45) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529); Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(7478); if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); TotPrice2 *= 1.66; } if(c.myShopId != 29 || c.myShopId != 30 || c.myShopId != 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } if(c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } } } } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { if (c.lvlPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.lvlPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough lvl Points."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } c.getItems().resetItems(3823); resetShop(c.myShopId); updatePlayerShop(); return true; } return false; }
[/quote]

Thanks man, would rep++ if i could[/quote]

I’m glad it worked, if you need any help, just PM me. I’ll be glad to help :).

Read full topic

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“The7thSanctum, post:18, topic:521523”]Replace all of your “buyitem” method with this. It should work.

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if(!shopSellsItem(itemID) && c.myShopId != 50 && c.myShopId != 60) return false; if (c.myShopId == 14) { skillBuy(itemID); return false; } else if (c.myShopId == 15) { buyVoid(itemID); return false; } if (amount > 0) { if (amount > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]) { amount = Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]; } //double ShopValue; //double TotPrice; int TotPrice2 = 0; //int Overstock; int Slot = 0; int Slot1 = 0;//Tokkul int Slot2 = 0;//Pking Points if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } if (c.myShopId == 45) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529); Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(7478); if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); TotPrice2 *= 1.66; } if(c.myShopId != 29 || c.myShopId != 30 || c.myShopId != 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } if(c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } } } } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { if (c.lvlPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.lvlPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough lvl Points."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } c.getItems().resetItems(3823); resetShop(c.myShopId); updatePlayerShop(); return true; } return false; } [/quote]

Thanks man, would rep++ if i could

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Replace all of your “buyitem” method with this. It should work.

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if(!shopSellsItem(itemID) && c.myShopId != 50 && c.myShopId != 60) return false; if (c.myShopId == 14) { skillBuy(itemID); return false; } else if (c.myShopId == 15) { buyVoid(itemID); return false; } if (amount > 0) { if (amount > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]) { amount = Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]; } //double ShopValue; //double TotPrice; int TotPrice2 = 0; //int Overstock; int Slot = 0; int Slot1 = 0;//Tokkul int Slot2 = 0;//Pking Points if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } if (c.myShopId == 45) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529); Slot3 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(7478); if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); TotPrice2 *= 1.66; } if(c.myShopId != 29 || c.myShopId != 30 || c.myShopId != 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } if(c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } } } } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { if (c.lvlPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.lvlPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } else if (c.myShopId == 45) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough lvl Points."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } c.getItems().resetItems(3823); resetShop(c.myShopId); updatePlayerShop(); return true; } return false; }

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:16, topic:521523”]SERIOUSLY?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438121.0.html
for all COMPILER RELATED ISSUES O_O im glad you took the time to read the stickied posts

but…

[quote]src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: error: illegal start of type
return false;
^[/quote]
here is your error.
File location of the error
Line in file error occured on.
Their reason/name for the error
Copy of the line, that the error occured on.
pointer showing you where the error is, (it is in right spot on compiler)
The illegal start of type usually means you have a missing bracket somewhere. (So start from line [694] as stated, and work your way up, finding out where your brackets don’t quite add up.
Or be like me, use netbeans and use the rightclick->format option, and it will shift all of the code below your missing bracket XD, fix it then format again lol.[/quote]
Thanks but my computer is too laggy for netbeans. yes i got a shit pc atm. :l

Fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

SERIOUSLY?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,438121.0.html
for all COMPILER RELATED ISSUES O_O im glad you took the time to read the stickied posts

but…

src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:694: error: illegal start of type return false; ^
here is your error. File location of the error Line in file error occured on. Their reason/name for the error Copy of the line, that the error occured on. pointer showing you where the error is, (it is in right spot on compiler) The illegal start of type usually means you have a missing bracket somewhere. (So start from line [694] as stated, and work your way up, finding out where your brackets don't quite add up. Or be like me, use netbeans and use the rightclick->format option, and it will shift all of the code below your missing bracket XD, fix it then format again lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Remove what you added and change this:

if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false;
To

if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 45 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false;

item.title: Error adding Level points and lvlp shop
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

Sorry, i didn’t know where the fuq it ends ;

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if(!shopSellsItem(itemID) && c.myShopId != 50 && c.myShopId != 60) return false; if (c.myShopId == 14) { skillBuy(itemID); return false; } else if (c.myShopId == 15) { buyVoid(itemID); return false; } if (amount > 0) { if (amount > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]) { amount = Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot]; } //double ShopValue; //double TotPrice; int TotPrice2 = 0; //int Overstock; int Slot = 0; int Slot1 = 0;//Tokkul int Slot2 = 0;//Pking Points if (c.myShopId == 17 || c.myShopId == 18 || c.myShopId == 50 || c.myShopId == 60) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } if (c.myShopId == 45) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false; } for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = c.getItems().getItemSlot(995); Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529); if (Slot == -1 && c.myShopId != 29 && c.myShopId != 30 && c.myShopId != 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } if(TotPrice2 <= 1) { TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); TotPrice2 *= 1.66; } if(c.myShopId != 29 || c.myShopId != 30 || c.myShopId != 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough coins."); break; } } if(c.myShopId == 29 || c.myShopId == 30 || c.myShopId == 31) { if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2); c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul."); break; } } } } else if(c.myShopId == 45) { if (c.lvlPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.lvlPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough lvl Points."); break; } }

I only added this part;

if (c.myShopId == 45) { handleOtherShop(itemID); return false;

And i added this too down there;

} else if(c.myShopId == 45) { if (c.lvlPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.lvlPoints -= TotPrice2; c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1); Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1; Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) { Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { c.sendMessage("You don't have enough lvl Points."); break; } }
